welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Essex, Canada! Nestled in the heart of wine country, our charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all the beauty and charm Essex has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Windsor Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Windsor Airport serves smaller regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Detroit City Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The McNamara Terminal is the main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport and serves as the hub for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport serves as the hub for low-cost carriers such as Spirit Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
